channel.title: 少侠的博客
channel.description: Recent content on 少侠的博客

item.title: En_zh
item.description: The comments he made were not at all appropriate. 他的评论一点都不恰当. There is a rumor that the general manager has misappropriated one million dollars of public funds. 有传言说总经理私吞了一百万美元的公款. This festival is in honor of a celebrity. 这个节日是为了纪念一位名人. His behaviors have brought dishonor onto his family. 他的行为给他的家人带来了 耻辱 . He is a dishonor to his family. 他成了他家的耻辱. The ethics of his profession don’t permit him to do that. 他的职业道德不允许他那样做. These shoppers are concerned with some ethical issues.

item.title: Myfirstarticle
item.description: 我的第一篇文章 床前明月光，疑似地上霜
